Package org.springframework.core.env

Spring's environment abstraction consisting of bean definition profile and hierarchical property source support.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PropertyResolverInterface for resolving properties against any underlying source.
    EnvironmentInterface representing the environment in which the current application is running.
    ConfigurablePropertyResolverConfiguration interface to be implemented by most if not all PropertyResolver types.
    PropertySourcesHolder containing one or more PropertySource objects.
    ConfigurableEnvironmentConfiguration interface to be implemented by most if not all Environment types.
    ProfilesProfile predicate that may be accepted by an Environment.
    EnvironmentCapableInterface indicating a component that contains and exposes an Environment reference.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MapPropertySourcePropertySource that reads keys and values from a Map object.
    StubPropertySourcePropertySource to be used as a placeholder in cases where an actual property source cannot be eagerly initialized at application context creation time.
    PropertySourceAbstract base class representing a source of name/value property pairs.
    JOptCommandLinePropertySourceCommandLinePropertySource implementation backed by a JOpt OptionSet.
    AbstractPropertyResolverAbstract base class for resolving properties against any underlying source.
    CompositePropertySourceComposite PropertySource implementation that iterates over a set of PropertySource instances.
    StandardEnvironmentEnvironment implementation suitable for use in 'standard' (i.e.
    MissingRequiredPropertiesExceptionException thrown when required properties are not found.
    EnumerablePropertySourceA PropertySource implementation capable of interrogating its underlying source object to enumerate all possible property name/value pairs.
    AbstractEnvironmentAbstract base class for Environment implementations.
    MutablePropertySourcesThe default implementation of the PropertySources interface.
    SystemEnvironmentPropertySourceSpecialization of MapPropertySource designed for use with system environment variables.
    SimpleCommandLinePropertySourceCommandLinePropertySource implementation backed by a simple String array.
    CommandLinePropertySourceAbstract base class for PropertySource implementations backed by command line arguments.
    PropertySourcesPropertyResolverPropertyResolver implementation that resolves property values against an underlying set of PropertySources.
    PropertiesPropertySourcePropertySource implementation that extracts properties from a java.util.Properties object.
    PropertyResolverExtensionsKt
